column6: na fa twerɛw wo tsir na wo bɔdwesa: na fa nsɛn ker nhwi no

column2: "Fa gya hyew nkyɛmu ebiasa mu kor wɔ kurow no finimfin
column3: ber a ntuae nda no ewie du no; na fa nkyɛmu ebiasa mu kor so
column4: na fa afona bobɔ ho hyia; na fa nkyɛmu ebiasa mu kor so petse mframa mu
column5: na mobɔtwe afona edzi hɔn ekyir."

column3: na tow gu gya no mu
column4: na hyew no wɔ gya no mu; no mu na gya befir aba Israel fifo nyina mu."

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Jerusalɛm nye yi: medze no esi amanaman finimfin
column3: na nkurow nkurow etwa no ho ehyia."

column2: "Na ɔatsew me ntsɛmbu do etua wɔ dɛ ɔayɛ emumuyɛ asen amanaman no
column3: na m'ahyɛdze so do asen nkurow nkurow a etwa no ho ehyia no: na wɔapow m'atsɛmbudze

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Osiandɛ hom yɛ akɔnkyew sen amanaman a etwa hom ho ehyia
column5: na hom annyɛ dɛ amanaman a etwa hom ho ehyia no hɔn mmom no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Hwɛ
column5: na menye wo enya; na mubobu atsɛn wɔ wo mu wɔ amanaman enyim."

column2: "Na dza mennyɛɛ da no mebɛyɛ no wo mu
"Dɛm ntsi egyanom bedzi mba wɔ wo mu
column3: na mba edzi hɔn egyanom; na mubobu atsɛn wɔ wo mu
column4: na wo nkaase nyina mabɔ apetse mframa nyina mu."

column6: na w'ekyiwadze nyina egu mo krɔnkrɔnbea ho fi ntsi
column7: mo so mubokuw wo do; eso m'enyi rennkam do
column8: na mo so murunnhu wo mbɔbɔr."

column2: "Wo mu nkyɛmu ebiasa mu kor bowuwu yardɔm ano
column3: na ɔkɔm ahyew hɔn wɔ wo mu; na nkyɛmu ebiasa mu kor so bɔtotɔ afona ano etwa wo ho ehyia; na nkyɛmu ebiasa mu kor so na mobɔbɔ apetse mframa nyina mu
column4: na matwe afona ataa hɔn do."
na mo werɛ akyekye: na wobohu dɛ emi mara EWURADZE na makasa wɔ mo mbɔdzembɔ mu
column5: ber a mewie m'ebufuhyew wɔ hɔn do."

column2: "Nkyii so mebɛyɛ wo amamfo na ahorohoraa
column3: wɔ amanaman a woetwa mo ho ehyia no mu
column4: wɔ hɔn a wotwa mu nyina enyim."
ama amanaman a woetwa wo ho ehyia; ber a mubobu atsɛn wɔ wo mu wɔ ebufuw na ebufuhyew
column5: na nkaenyim dzendzen mu no: emi EWURADZE na maka."

column2: "Ber a mobɔtotow ɔkɔm mbusu egyen menaba megu hɔn do
column3: dza ɔdze ɔsɛɛ ba a mobɔtotow dɛ medze resɛɛ hom; na mabɛma kɔm adɔɔ hom do so

column2: "na mobɔsoma kɔm na mbowa ebusufo aba hom do
column3: na wɔama edzi awo mba ewu; na yardɔm na bɔgya bodua wo mu asen; na medze afona bɛba wo do: emi EWURADZE na maka."
